original_text: The person who is not clean might not wash himself and his clothes. If he does not do it, you must make that person separate from the people. That is because he has made the Lord's Holy Place become unclean. Because the priest did not splash special water on him he will not be clean.
korean_text: 사람이 부정하고도 자신을 정결하게 하지 아니하면 여호와의 성소를 더럽힘이니 그러므로 회중 가운데에서 끊어질 것이니라 그는 정결하게 하는 물로 뿌림을 받지 아니하였은즉 부정하니라

sentences.original_text: The person who is not clean
might not wash himself and his clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 자신과 옷을 씻지 않을 수도 있다

sentences.original_text: If he does not do it
you must make that person separate from the people
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그 사람을 백성들로부터 분리시켜야 한다

sentences.original_text: That is because he has made the Lord's Holy Place become unclean
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그가 주의 성소를 더럽혔기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: Because the priest did not splash special water on him
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장이 그에게 특별한 물을 뿌리지 않았기 때문에
